# Democratic Revolutionary Council

| leaders          = Ahmat AcylAcheikh ibn Oumar
| split            =
| ideology         = Islamic socialismFrancophobiaArab nationalism
| partof           = UFDD UFDD-F
| predecessor      = Volcan Army
}}
The Democratic Revolutionary Council ( or CDR), active in Chad, was a faction of  FROLINAT founded by Ahmat Acyl and later headed by Acheikh ibn Oumar and was also known as the New Volcan Army.
See also
*Chadian Civil War (disambiguation)
*Toyota War
References
